name: SC - an interactive experience
description:
The unnamed protagonist goes through an insightful journey through his mind.

A message from the Randy Dandy Club:

This is the artistic experience created from our imagination after an intense game jam weekend, were we consumed a lot of lovely delicate crunchy snacks.

Now we need funding for snacks so that we can create our next game Booty Rumble Universe where girls fight with their butts on water arenas with sexy swim suits.

So now we ask you for your help to make (the gaming world a better place) our dreams come true with lovely delicate crunchy snacks.
